title: Little Happier: An Old and Famous Story about How We Can’t Outrun Our Fate
description:
The ancient and haunting teaching story about “an appointment in Samarra” is a wonderful illustration of the inevitability of fate.
Get tickets for our live podcast events in Seattle, Portland, San Fransisco, Chicago, Kansas City,  Providence, Philadelphia, Washington D.C., Atlanta Brooklyn and Charlotte here:https://gretchenrubin.com/events
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
